attributes.action: raise with President Chirac the possibility of a union between the United Kingdom and France.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the time is right to revive the idea of a union between our two great nations, only this time with the UK becoming French. This would benefit the British people by delivering a shorter working week, better food, a train service that works, an efficient health service, a general acceptance that income should be hidden from the Govt, and women who apparently think nothing of spending hundreds of Euros on lingerie.
